CustomField.formula: CASE(Fin_SLA_interne__c, "4 H", IMAGE("/resource/SLA4H?", "4 H", 50,50), "24 H", IMAGE("/resource/SLA24H?", "24 H",50,50), "48 H", IMAGE("/resource/SLA48H?", "48 H",50,50), "Hors SLA", IMAGE("/resource/SLAHORS?", "Hors SLA",50,50), "72 H", IMAGE ("/resource/SLA72H?","",50,50), "")
CustomField.label: SLA
